title: Tile, late 18th–early 19th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Seated man with bare feet, holding flower in his left hand.  Leaves at left and right.   Debased variant of 1920-15-136.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tile, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Earthenware, glazed, high fire decorated. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1920-15-111.
